## [0.2.0] - 2025-09-12

### Changed
- Minimum supported Typst version is now 0.12
- Documentation is now at https://typst-community.github.io/prequery/ instead of in the PDF manual.
  The manual still contains tidy-generated docs for now.

## [0.1.0] - 2024-03-19

Initial Release
